# 学性感

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xuexinggan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xuexinggan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xuexinggan
xuexinggan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xuexinggan
xuexinggan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
